Metadata.homeDescription: Journey to the future: Discover car, shopping, home and travel management in one platform with the smart voice assistant solution.
Metadata.carTitle: Dtec Car Assistant – Voice Control & Face Recognition | Safe Driving
Metadata.carDescription: Your intelligent companion that redefines the driving experience: face and emotion recognition, voice vehicle equipment control, email sending, multi‑language translation and reminders.
Metadata.shoppingTitle: Dtec Shopping Assistant – Voice Shopping with Advanced NLP
Metadata.shoppingDescription: Easy shopping experience by talking: advanced NLP, intelligent filtering, secure payment, personalized recommendations and support in 22 languages.
Metadata.shopifyTitle: Dtec Shopify Assistant – Voice Shopping with Advanced NLP
Metadata.shopifyDescription: Easy shopping experience by talking: advanced NLP, intelligent filtering, secure payment, personalized recommendations and support in 22 languages.
Metadata.homeAssistantTitle: Dtec Smart Home Assistant – IoT Integration & Automation
Metadata.homeAssistantDescription: Smart home assistant offering synchronized scenarios between home and car, real-time device control, energy saving and high security.
Metadata.travelTitle: Dtec Travel Assistant - Flight, Hotel & Planning Assistant
Metadata.travelDescription: Personal travel companion that makes your travel planning easier: real-time flight assistance, hotel recommendations, prices and privacy focused on security.
Metadata.aiCallCenterTitle: Artificial Intelligence Powered Call Center Experience
Metadata.aiCallCenterDescription: Our Dtec AI Call Center solution revolutionizes the customer experience by managing incoming and outgoing calls without human intervention. Increase the efficiency of your business and communicate with your customers faster, more personally and effectively with AI-powered calls.
Metadata.aboutTitle: About Us - Dtec: The Future of Interaction with Voice Assistant
Metadata.aboutDescription: We aim for brands to offer their own unique voice in the world of voice interaction. Our mission is to develop universal interactive speech assistants.

Hero.description: Step into an extraordinary customer experience with Dtec AI Call Center : Take your service quality to the top with autonomous call management, instant solutions and 24/7 multilingual support. Increase efficiency and satisfaction with a system that becomes smarter in every interaction.

HomePage.mindsmeet: the place where all minds meet

Dtec AI Call Center.title: Dtec AI Call Center
Dtec AI Call Center.description: Our Dtec AI Call Center solution revolutionizes customer experience by managing incoming and outgoing calls without human intervention!
Dtec AI Call Center.sectionTitle: The Future of Call Experience Has Begun.
Dtec AI Call Center.sectionDescription: Revolutionize customer service with our AI-powered call center solution. DtecAI automatically manages incoming and outgoing calls, provides personalized service, and offers 24/7 uninterrupted support.

f1.title: Smart Call Reception
f1.description: Accurate routing and instant resolution for every call.

f4.title: Continuously Learning Intelligence
f4.description: A system that improves with every interaction.

scalability.title: Scalable Structure
scalability.description: DtecAI can flexibly adapt to all scales <bold>from small teams to global operations</bold>. It meets growing needs without additional development.

security.title: Enterprise Security Standards
security.description: All communications and transaction records are encrypted and stored in accordance with <bold>international security standards</bold>. DtecAI takes your data privacy seriously.

howItWorks.title: How It Works?
howItWorks.subtitle: Be present with DtecAI wherever your customers are.

col1.title: Instant Detection and Routing
points: When a customer calls you, DtecAI automatically answers the call.
It analyzes the caller’s need <bold>within seconds</bold>.
Provides or routes <bold>the most accurate response</bold> based on the topic.

col2.title: Listen, Understand, and Respond with AI
points: Understands what the customer says and wants with <bold>NLP technology</bold>.
Offers a <bold>natural and fluent conversation</bold> experience similar to a human.
Learns from each interaction to give <bold>more accurate responses in the future</bold>.

col3.title: Efficient, Measurable, and Always Ready
points: <bold>Calls are autonomously made</bold> for appointment reminders, campaigns, and surveys.
With 24/7 service, <bold>no incoming call is left unanswered</bold>.
Reduces operational costs and <bold>increases customer satisfaction</bold>.

automation.title: Automated Process Flows
automation.description: Say goodbye to manual operations. <bold>Emails, SMS, or CRM entries triggered after each customer interaction are fully automated.</bold> Save time, eliminate errors.

Ecosystem.title: Ecosystem
Ecosystem.description: Thanks to its advanced natural language processing capabilities and high-level artificial intelligence features, Dtec not only understands the driver's voice commands but can also detect the driver's mood through its built-in autonomous learning system and emotional reconciliation mechanism, and proactively offer solutions and services by anticipating needs and requests.

Dtec Assistants.title: Dtec Assistants
Dtec Assistants.description:
All-in-one smart voice assistants:
Guidance with every command, comfort at every step.

car.title: Dtec Car Assistant
car.description: Enables conversation with vehicles as if talking to a human. It interacts with you through voice recognition technology and quickly executes the information or commands you request.

shopping.title: Dtec Shopping Assistant
shopping.description: A shopping assistant where everyone can comfortably shop on e-commerce platforms by speaking.

home.title: Dtec Smart Home Assistant
home.description: Specializes in data analysis, device management, and optimizing user experience by working in harmony with IoT devices.

f1.title: Natural Language Understanding (NLU)
f1.description: Speech comprehension for intuitive user communication, context-rich interactions

f2.title: Multimodal Interaction
f2.description: Seamless voice, text, and visual transitions for flexible user interaction

f3.title: Personalization and User Recognition
f3.description: Learn and remember user preferences by tailoring responses to personalized interaction

f4.title: Integration with Third-Party Services
f4.description: Connect to various services to create a central hub for convenience

f5.title: Context-Aware Task Continuity
f5.description: Maintain context for smooth interactions, reducing the need for repetition

limitations.l1: Basic and static responses and answers.

TokenSection.header: Experience the Future of Mobility with Dtec Token!
TokenSection.description: Dtec Token enables voice command control through the Dtec Assistant, which operates on blockchain infrastructure. You earn tokens when your vehicle is charged or when you use the assistant. These rewards can be freely spent within the system and used to create value. Thanks to real-time data, artificial intelligence, and secure blockchain integration, mobility is now smarter, more rewarding, and entirely personal.

feature_1.title: Voice Command Access
feature_1.description: Instant voice access to IoT devices and applications.

feature_2.title: Artificial Intelligence Integration
feature_2.description: Assistant-supported, continuously evolving smart mobility ecosystem.

feature_3.title: Personalized Experience
feature_3.description: Dynamic optimization based on driving habits.

feature_4.title: Token Earning
feature_4.description: Earn tokens through charging and assistant interactions, use them as you wish.

feature_5.title: Real-Time Data
feature_5.description: Efficient mobility with instant route and driving insights.

feature_6.title: Blockchain Assurance
feature_6.description: The transparent, secure, and traceable transaction infrastructure of blockchain.

car-assistant.title:
Redefined
Driving
Experience
car-assistant.description: Our Car Assistant is an intelligent companion that stays with you throughout your journey. It provides access to all vehicle functions via voice commands, maximizing your safety and comfort while offering every detail you need without taking your eyes off the road.
car-assistant.faceRecognitionDescription: Recognizes each driver individually and automatically activates settings suitable for their profile.
car-assistant.moodBasedSuggestionsDescription: Detects your mood during the drive and suggests the most suitable music, weather, or entertainment options.
car-assistant.voiceControlDescription: Allows completely hands-free control of devices like phone, air conditioning, and media systems.
car-assistant.sendEmailDescription: Allows easy email sending inside the vehicle based on the driver's voice commands.
car-assistant.chatAndInfoDescription: The Car Assistant chats naturally with the driver, providing information and meaningful answers to questions.
car-assistant.qaResponseDescription: Provides instant and effective answers to the driver's questions.
car-assistant.translateDescription: With its translation ability, it enables effective communication for international travels or multilingual users.
car-assistant.reminderDescription: Saves reminders set by the driver to help them remember important events at the specified date and time.
car-assistant.dtecgpt: Our developed DtecGPT combines natural language processing and context tracking. It understands your complex questions like a human and offers a conversational experience with fluent, comprehensive answers. It unifies all the information you need with a single touch while interpreting your vehicle-related commands.
car-assistant.dtecgptDescription: Our Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) and Natural Language Understanding (NLU) modules process your commands quickly and accurately, responding almost with human-like skill. This ensures the most appropriate action is instantly triggered for every request, and the system continuously improves to make your driving experience smoother.
car-assistant.SafeExperienceDesc: Vehicle Assistant offers completely hands-free control by eliminating manual distractions. It voice-activates critical alerts and emergency notifications; and thanks to its multitasking ability, it allows you to manage your route, communication or entertainment without interruption. This maximizes both your safety and the efficiency of your journey.

shopping-assistant.heroDescription: The Dtec Shopping Assistant combines all stages from product search to cart creation and payment via voice commands in one flow. Users can find products, compare prices, and complete secure payment steps hands-free with a single sentence. This solution, which works seamlessly on both mobile apps and websites, simultaneously increases customer satisfaction and conversion rates.
shopping-assistant.f1description: Thanks to its advanced NLP (Natural Language Processing) model, it can understand users' natural spoken language, making the shopping experience more personal and interactive.
shopping-assistant.f2description: The AI-powered assistant offers users the ability to quickly and effectively find the products they want by understanding preferences such as color, size, and brand using powerful filtering algorithms.
shopping-assistant.f3description: The Dtec Shopping Assistant works fully compatible with smartphones and web browsers, offering users a flawless shopping experience from any device.
shopping-assistant.f4description: The Shopping Assistant supports various payment methods, ensuring secure and seamless payment processes and enabling purchases to be completed with credit cards or other options.
shopping-assistant.f5description: The assistant analyzes user behavior through its learning module to offer personalized product recommendations, ensuring users have a shopping experience tailored to their preferences.
shopping-assistant.f6description: The Dtec Shopping Assistant operates in 22 different languages, catering to a global user base and providing optimal service to users from different regions and language groups.
shopping-assistant.dtecgpt: Our advanced AI, DtecGPT, makes shopping intuitive by understanding and responding to human-like conversations. Thanks to this technology, shopping becomes not just a transaction but an intelligent conversational experience.
shopping-assistant.smartshoppingDescription: The DTEC Shopping Assistant can be used in e-commerce sites, online markets, ticketing systems, and reservation applications, offering speed, convenience, accessibility, and personalized recommendations. It also facilitates access for visually impaired users. Positioned in the B2B model, our system is unique in its field.
shopping-assistant.se3description: The future of shopping is managed by voice. As the pioneer of this transformation, DTEC brings the comfort of shopping with voice commands to every area of e-commerce. This technology, which increases user interaction and conversion rates, offers a new growth path for brands.

home-assistant.heroTitle: Smart Assistant for Your Home Comfort
home-assistant.heroDescription: The DTEC Home Assistant offers the smartest way to manage your living space from a single center. Lights, heating/cooling systems, security cameras, and much more are under control with just one voice command. With energy efficiency and top-level security features, it increases your comfort and provides a peaceful environment.
home-assistant.f1description: The Smart Home Assistant enables the creation of customized scenarios between home and car assistants, allowing seamless integration when leaving home or returning. This integration offers users a smooth home-car transition experience.
home-assistant.f2description: The Smart Home Assistant provides real-time data to users through security cameras, sensors, and devices inside the home. This allows users to monitor home events instantly and intervene when necessary.
home-assistant.f3description: Home and car assistants allow users to manage their homes and cars anytime, anywhere using their mobile devices. Users have the freedom to control their homes remotely.
home-assistant.f4title: Advanced Data Security and Secure Communication
home-assistant.f4description: The Smart Home Assistant uses strong encryption technologies to maximize the security of user data. Users' personal information is protected according to industry-standard security protocols in communications between home devices and external networks.
home-assistant.f5description: The Smart Home Assistant offers the ability to create personalized automation scenarios based on users' predetermined preferences and routines. This allows users to manage their living spaces more effectively and personally.
home-assistant.HomeCallDescription: The Smart Home Assistant provides users with instant updates through real-time connections. For example, live images from security cameras at home, instant data from door or window sensors, and energy consumption information allow users to monitor their homes at all times. Integration with the Car Assistant enables users to access and control information from their vehicles even when away from home, offering a complete mobile lifestyle. This is a living experience combined with the powerful integration of home and car assistants.
home-assistant.se3description: The Smart Home Assistant not only limits users' home control to the interior but also allows interaction with their cars. This assistant can adjust the car's comfort settings according to predetermined preferences when leaving or returning home. For example, when approaching home, it can automatically open doors, turn on lights, and set the thermostat to the desired temperature. This integration offers users a continuous and seamless connection between their home and vehicles.

travel-assistant.heroTitle: Embark on New Discoveries with the Travel Assistant
travel-assistant.heroDescription: Start your journeys with Dtec, your personal travel companion designed to make your travel planning smooth and enjoyable. Dtec helps you find online travel information, guides you at every step from booking plane tickets to discovering comfortable hotels, and serves as your personal expert throughout your travel.
travel-assistant.f1Description: For flight reservations, Dtec provides real-time information on schedules, airlines, and ticket prices. Whether you're looking for budget or luxury, Dtec ensures an effortless booking experience according to your preferences.
travel-assistant.f2Description: Ask Dtec for hotel recommendations, and it will create a list of comfortable options suitable for you. With Dtec, hotel images are displayed to help you visually select your accommodation.
travel-assistant.f3Description: Stay always up to date with Dtec's real-time updates. Whether it's sudden flight changes or last-minute hotel deals, Dtec keeps you informed and provides flexibility in your travel plans.
travel-assistant.f4Description: Stay safe with Dtec's commitment to security and privacy. Your data is processed to the highest standards.
travel-assistant.f5Description: Have natural conversations with Dtec. Ask for the cheapest flights or request a hotel with specific features. Dtec offers personalized recommendations based on your preferences.

ai-assistant.heroTitle: Artificial Intelligence Powered Call Center Experience
ai-assistant.heroDescription: Our Dtec AI Call Center solution revolutionizes the customer experience by managing incoming and outgoing calls without human intervention. Increase the efficiency of your business and communicate with your customers faster, more personally and effectively with AI-powered calls.
ai-assistant.f1Description: Provide information, appointment reminders or surveys with personalized calls.
ai-assistant.f2Description: Provides correct routing and instant solutions for incoming calls.
ai-assistant.f3Description: Uninterrupted support system that does not require day or night.
ai-assistant.f4Description: Increase efficiency while reducing operational costs.
ai-assistant.f5Description: Personal communication experience based on customer history.
ai-assistant.f6Description: Provide quality service to global customers in their native language.
ai-assistant.section2Description:
DtecAI Voice not only understands what customers say, but also understands their intentions, thanks to advanced natural language processing (NLP) technologies, and provides fast and accurate solutions.
With its human-like dialogue capabilities, it minimizes waiting times in your call center and maximizes user satisfaction. It also analyzes every conversation, thus continuously optimizing your processes
ai-assistant.section3Title: Communication Model of the Future: Autonomous Calls
ai-assistant.section3Description: DtecAI makes personalized calls to customers without requiring manual action. It autonomously performs operations such as appointment confirmation, payment reminder, campaign information or survey with AI-powered calls. Since conversations are natural and fluid, customers feel like they are communicating with a real representative, thus maximizing the user experience.
ai-assistant.section4Description: DtecAI Call Center constantly improves itself by learning from every customer interaction. The system analyzes the responses, evaluates customer satisfaction scores and quickly adapts to new customer behaviors. Thus, it strengthens customer relationships by providing a more personal, faster and more accurate communication experience over time.

AboutPage.title:
A New Experience
With Every Word
AboutPage.description: Welcome to Dtec. We are ushering in a new era of interaction where brands and users meet through the power of voice. Our voice assistants interpret every word to reflect your brand’s unique identity, making the connection you build with users personalized, consistent, and unforgettable.
AboutPage.features1description: We help you build an unforgettable auditory presence that goes beyond your visual identity. With our cutting-edge voice assistant technologies, we enable brands to establish a direct and empathetic connection with their target audiences, personalizing every interaction to increase customer loyalty and satisfaction.
AboutPage.features2description: We envision a universe where conversation knows no boundaries, and every device and brand gives meaning to the human voice. As Dtec, we aim to break the barriers between humans and technology, placing voice-based interaction at the center of daily life and building the digital experiences of the future starting today.
AboutPage.award1_description: Supported by the TÜBİTAK 1507 R&D Program with Project Number "7180493" titled "Voice Control and Vehicle Assistant System with Artificial Intelligence Hologram Technology for Use in Domestic Cars and All Vehicles." The project has been successfully completed.
AboutPage.award2_description: Our project was supported by the KOSGEB cooperation program with Board Decision No: 2020-56038-30/1 and was successfully completed.
AboutPage.award3_description: Our project was selected for the İTÜ Çekirdek 2021 program and won an award on the BIG BANG stage.
AboutPage.award4_description: Achieved an award-winning position in the 'Future Automotive Design Competition' organized by OIB.
AboutPage.award5_description: Ranked in the top 10 among 850 startups in the mobility program organized by TOGG. Development for the TOGG domestic car is ongoing.
AboutPage.award6_description: Selected for the 2023 BTM (Commercialization of Knowledge Center) program.
AboutPage.award7_description: Reached the finals in the 2023 Teknofest competition.
AboutPage.tubitakDescription: Awarded support under the TÜBİTAK 1507 R&D Program with Project Number "7230004" titled "Artificial Intelligence Shopping Assistant Operable on Shopping Platforms." The project is currently ongoing.
AboutPage.patent1: Patent No. 2017/12836 titled 'VIP Smart Vehicle System' was granted on 22.08.2022. All rights related to the patent belong to us.
AboutPage.patent2: International patent application No. PCT/TR2022/050946 titled 'Artificial Intelligence Smart Vehicle Assistant' was filed on 05.09.2022. The initial review was positive. We hold the intellectual property rights for this idea.
AboutPage.patent3: Patent application No. 2023/006162 titled 'Artificial Intelligence Smart Vehicle Assistant System' has been approved by the Turkish Patent and Trademark Office.

shopify-assistant.title: Shopify Assistant
shopify-assistant.description: We store logged-in user data to improve the Assistant experience. Your shipping and default address may be used during the checkout process through the Assistant. You can view or request deletion of your data after logging in.
shopify-assistant.description2: Use the DTEC Extension in your store by following the steps below.
step1Details: Log in to your account to retrieve the access token.
Copy the access token for use.
shopify-assistant.step2: Install the Extension in Your Store
step2Details: Go to Apps → Find and open your installed extension.
Ensure the extension is enabled for use.
shopify-assistant.step3: Get Your Storefront API Access Token
step3Details: Generate the Storefront API Access Token:
Array [(error) => Missing required parameters ] Access Token not found, please reinstall the app to generate a new Storefront API access token.
Copy your Storefront API Access Token.
shopify-assistant.step4: Configure the Extension in Shopify Theme
step4Details: Navigate to the theme editor and add the app after the header to display it on every page.
Click Add Section or Add Block (depending on your extension type).
Look for your extension in the list and add it.
Adjust settings as needed and click Save.
step5Details: 1. Storefront API Key (Required) • Paste the Storefront API Access Token (from Step 2) to fetch products.
2. DTEC Access Token (Required) • Paste the DTEC Access Token (from Step 1).
3. Select Extension Language • Choose between English or Turkish. • This setting changes the extension’s UI language.
4. Customize Product Layout • Modify the HTML structure to change how products are displayed. • Access this in the extension settings under "Product Layout".
5. Set Product Display Limit • Adjust how many products are shown in search results. • After making changes, click "Save" to apply updates.
shopify-assistant.step6: Test the Extension on Your Store
step6Details: 2. Navigate to the page where your extension is added.
4. If needed, go back and adjust settings.
step7Details: • Ensure your Storefront API Key is correctly added.
• Ensure your DTEC access token is correctly added.
• Verify the Read Products permission is enabled.
• Refresh the page and check settings.
• Clear browser cache or test in incognito mode.
• Confirm the limit is set in extension settings.

Forms.registrationSuccessMessage: Registration successful! Please login to continue.
Forms.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
Forms.passwordComplexity: Password must contain letters, numbers, and special characters
